title: Boston Bombing Suspect's Friend Is Convicted On Obstruction Charges
teaser: A college friend of Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev has been convicted of impeding the investigation into the attack. Azamat Tazhayakov was found guilty Monday of obstruction of justice and conspiracy.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
